locale.name: en_US
locale.message: Export issue, article and galley metadata in Onix for DOI (O4DOI) format and register DOIs with the mEDRA registration agency.
Please configure the mEDRA export plug-in before using it for the first time.
Please configure the mEDRA export plug-in:
Please choose whether you want to export issues as 'works' or 'manifestations'.
Please choose the country to be informed as 'publication country' to mEDRA.
Please enter a technical support contact in the Journal Setup (step 1 - details) before exporting to mEDRA.
NB: DOIs assigned to articles will be exported to mEDRA as 'works'. DOIs assigned to galleys will be exported as 'manifestations'.

Usage: {$scriptName} {$pluginName} export xmlFileName journal_path {issues|articles|galleys} objectId1 [objectId2] ... {$scriptName} {$pluginName} register journal_path {issues|articles|galleys} objectId1 [objectId2] ...
